Alakazam (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0064: Kadabra
Pokémon
#0066: Machop →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Alakazam (TCG Pocket).

Alakazam has been featured on 17 different cards since it debuted in the Base Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Alakazam cards are normally Psychic-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Alakazam

Alakazam
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
